## Merge Scheduler
> If you'd like to use the merge scheduler GitHub Action, when you're ready to merge, then add a comment to the bottom of this description where the date/time is written in UTC and the pull request will merged and deployed within the next 5â€“10 minutes after the time provided. The comment should look like this:
> ```
> /schedule YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS
> ```
